mods.name: HD Climates map meets Paper map
mods.description: Fusion between "HD Textures Climates Travel Map" and "Paper Map for Daggerfall Unity", with coats of arms for each region.
mods.game_folder: HD Climates map meets Paper map

mods.name: Real Grass
mods.description: A mod for Daggerfall Unity that provides a groundcover with grass and other details.

mods.name: Simple 3d Trees
mods.description: Replaces 2d sprites of trees and rocks with 3d models.

mods.name: Basic Roads
mods.description: Adds roads and dirt tracks to the world of Daggerfall, which can be travelled upon if you use my Travel Options mod.
